definition: Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Do the troops who lost the war can still go through the Deshengmen Gate?
sentences.chinese: 战败的军队是否能够通过德胜门入城？

definition: Yongdingmen, front gate of the outer section of Beijing's old city wall, torn down in the 1950s and reconstructed in 2005
Guanganmen in Xuanwu 宣武區|宣武区 district of southwest Beijing
Xizhimen neighborhood of Beijing/the main northwest gate of Beijing
Badaling, a particular section of the Great Wall that is a favorite tourist destination
Mutianyu, well-preserved section of the Great Wall 70km from Beijing
Changping district of Beijing, formerly Changping county
Shunyi district of Beijing, formerly Shunyi county
